name: Super Sparty Bros (MarcoTTC)
description:
This is a short platformer game I developed as part of the Game Design and Development Specialization by Michigan State University on Coursera. Sparty is the name of the MSUmascot, and the player character on this game. While the original game was developed by Brian Winn and Greg Kozma, but this version was modified by me. I hope you enjoy playing this game.

Use WASD to move you character, use E to teleport you character, hold Up to hide in bushes, and down to unhide. You can stomp the enemies on the head. Go for the rose and avoid the enemies.
